subject: Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Steroids
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: In a deal with French antidoping authorities, Floyd Landis has agreed not to compete this year in the Tour de France, or any other race in France.
snippet: In a deal with French antidoping authorities, Floyd Landis has agreed not to compete this year in the Tour de France, or any other race in France.
